DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess efficacy safety etelcalcetide compare placebo treatment SHPT patient chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) receive hemodialysis .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Etelcalcetide ( AMG 416 ) Treatment Secondary Hyperparathyroidism ( SHPT ) Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Subject understands study procedure agree participate study give write informed consent . Subject 18 year age old . Subject must receive hemodialysis 3 time weekly least 3 month Subject agree participate another study investigational agent study . Other Inclusion Criteria may apply Currently receive treatment another investigational device drug study , end treatment another investigational device drug study ( ) within 8 week prior screen . Other investigational procedure participate study exclude . Anticipated schedule parathyroidectomy study period . Subject receive parathyroidectomy within 3 month prior dose . Anticipated schedule kidney transplant study period . Subject know sensitivity product component administer dose . Subject participate prior clinical trial AMG 416 ( also refer KAI4169 ) . Subject receive cinacalcet within 4 week prior screen lab ( treatment cinacalcet prohibit study ) . Subject unstable medical condition base medical history , physical examination , routine laboratory test , otherwise unstable judgment Investigator . Other Exclusion Criteria may apply
DOC.keyword: Secondary Hyperparathyroidism ( SHPT ) , chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) , hemodialysis , parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) , hypocalcemia , bone mineral metabolism
